name: Land of Desolation III: End of Darkness
name_original: Land of Desolation III: End of Darkness
description:
Land of Desolation III: End of Darkness

An adventure game made with Scratch (https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/300751443/), in english/french.

Important: In normal mode or in fullscreen, if you can't play, click with the mouse on one of the two black bars (situed on the left and on the right of the game).

Story:

1000 years ago, a kingdom named Lightreborn was created. The kings of Darkness, with their bad powers, wanted to reign on these lands. But a new hero appears each time to beat the current king of Darkness. 

Now, one year has passed after the last war, and the first king has won and resurrected all his sons. Go, kill them all, and make return the peace in this kingdom of brightness.

Controls:

Use arrow keys in the language selection screen and to move; press A to hit with the sword or break something (like a flag); press I to open chest and doors (with keys), to burn something or to enter a code. Red arrow show places to interact; your sword must touch the object, then press A or I.

Other games of the serie (on Scratch, not on Itch.io):

Land of Desolation I https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/229190392/

Land of Desolation II: Dark Solarus https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/244318570/

Enjoy ! :)
